permissions: Requires authentication. Admins can update action items. Non-admins can update action items only if they are a member of the responsible organization or its broker.
side_effects: Updates action item fields. Status changes may sync tracker status, create notifications, and trigger async summary updates on the server.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one updatable field must be provided. due-on and completed-on must be ISO 8601 dates (YYYY-MM-DD). status and kind must use allowed enum values. requires-xbe-feature must be true/false. expected-cost-amount and expected-benefit-amount must be numeric and >= 0; if either is set, currency_code must be present. status=complete requires completed_on to be set, and completed_on cannot be set unless status is complete.

flags.description: New kind: feature, integration, sombrero, bug_fix, change_management, data_seeding, training
flags.validation: Enum values: feature, integration, sombrero, bug_fix, change_management, data_seeding, training.
